author: jeffyang1
title: Token Minting Service
description: Small pool needs to offer more incentives to offer delegators to grow their business because people just want the most rewards.
solution: I think the solution is to help other pool operators figure out a community token strategy and also help them issue tokens to drive adoption
experience:
I'm an engineer at SpaceX, so I have a lot of problem-solving skill sets, and I am adaptable.
I also have a good understanding of psychology
